languages.text: {n}Промокнув испарины на лбу краешком робы, Адальберт тепло улыбается:{/n} "Бог-Император никогда не оставит верных своих, Ваша Светлость. Отдыхайте. Вскоре вам станет намного лучше".
languages.translation_comment:
Выход
снять с игрока бафф LT_Contaminated_buff

Выход
снять с игрока бафф LT_Contaminated_buff

languages.text: {n}Adalbert dabs at the sweat on his brow with the edge of his robe and smiles warmly.{/n} "The God-Emperor never abandons His faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Rest now. You will soon feel much better."
languages.original_text: {n}Промокнув испарины на лбу краешком робы, Адальберт тепло улыбается:{/n} "Бог-Император никогда не оставит верных своих, Ваша Светлость. Отдыхайте. Вскоре вам станет намного лучше".

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert dabs the sweat off his brow with the edge of his robe and smiles warmly.{/n} "The God-Emperor never abandons His faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Rest now. You will soon feel much better."

{n}Adalbert dabs at the sweat on his brow with the edge of his robe and smiles warmly.{/n} "The God-Emperor never abandons His faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Rest now. You will soon feel much better."

{n}Adalbert dabs at the sweat on his brow with the edge of his robe and smiles warmly.{/n} "The God-Emperor never abandons His faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Rest now. You will soon feel much better."

{n}Adalbert dabs at the sweat on his brow with the edge of his robe and smiles warmly.{/n} "The God-Emperor never abandons His faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Rest now. You will soon feel much better."

{n}Adalbert dabs at the sweat on his brow with the edge of his robe and smiles warmly.{/n} "The God-Emperor never abandons His faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Rest now. You will soon feel much better."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert se seca el sudor de la frente con el extremo de su túnica y sonríe con amabilidad.{/n} «El Dios Emperador nunca abandona a Sus fieles, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Descanse. Pronto se encontrará mucho mejor».
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert dabs at the sweat on his brow with the edge of his robe and smiles warmly.{/n} "The God-Emperor never abandons His faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Rest now. You will soon feel much better."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert se seca el sudor de la frente con el extremo de su túnica y sonríe con amabilidad.{/n} «El Dios Emperador nunca abandona a Sus fieles, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Descanse. Pronto se encontrará mucho mejor».

languages.text: {n}アダルバートはローブの端で眉間の汗を拭い、温かく微笑んだ。{/n} 「神帝陛下は忠実なお方を見捨てられることはありません、陛下。今は休んでください。きっとすぐ気分が良くなるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert dabs at the sweat on his brow with the edge of his robe and smiles warmly.{/n} "The God-Emperor never abandons His faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Rest now. You will soon feel much better."

traits.locale_text: {n}アダルバートはローブの端で眉間の汗を拭い、温かく微笑んだ。{/n} 「神帝陛下は忠実なお方を見捨てられることはありません、陛下。今は休んでください。きっとすぐ気分が良くなるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特用长袍边缘轻轻擦了擦额头上的汗水，之后露出了温和的笑容。{/n}“神皇从来不会抛弃祂忠诚的信徒，大人。好好休息一下吧，之后您很快就能好起来了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert dabs at the sweat on his brow with the edge of his robe and smiles warmly.{/n} "The God-Emperor never abandons His faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Rest now. You will soon feel much better."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特用长袍边缘轻轻擦了擦额头上的汗水，之后露出了温和的笑容。{/n}“神皇从来不会抛弃祂忠诚的信徒，大人。好好休息一下吧，之后您很快就能好起来了。”

languages.text: {n}Adalbert tupft sich mit der Kante seiner Robe die Stirn ab und lächelt warm.{/n} "Der Gottimperator lässt Seine Gläubigen nie im Stich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ruht Euch jetzt aus. Ihr werdet Euch schon bald viel besser fühlen."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert dabs at the sweat on his brow with the edge of his robe and smiles warmly.{/n} "The God-Emperor never abandons His faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Rest now. You will soon feel much better."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert tupft sich mit der Kante seiner Robe die Stirn ab und lächelt warm.{/n} "Der Gottimperator lässt Seine Gläubigen nie im Stich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ruht Euch jetzt aus. Ihr werdet Euch schon bald viel besser fühlen."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert éponge la sueur sur son front avec l'ourlet de sa robe et vous adresse un sourire chaleureux.{/n} « L'Empereur-Dieu n'abandonne jamais Ses fidèles, Votre Seigneurie. Reposez-vous, à présent. Vous vous sentirez bientôt mieux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert dabs at the sweat on his brow with the edge of his robe and smiles warmly.{/n} "The God-Emperor never abandons His faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Rest now. You will soon feel much better."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert éponge la sueur sur son front avec l'ourlet de sa robe et vous adresse un sourire chaleureux.{/n} « L'Empereur-Dieu n'abandonne jamais Ses fidèles, Votre Seigneurie. Reposez-vous, à présent. Vous vous sentirez bientôt mieux. »

languages.text: {n}Adalbert kaşlarındaki teri cübbesinin kenarıyla siliyor ve sevgi dolu bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Tanrı İmparator, O'na inananları asla yalnız bırakmaz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Dinlenin şimdi. Yakında çok daha iyi hissedeceksiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert dabs at the sweat on his brow with the edge of his robe and smiles warmly.{/n} "The God-Emperor never abandons His faithful, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Rest now. You will soon feel much better."
